game:item-tuningcylinder-107: Tuning Cylinder (The Safety of a Warm Fire)
game:item-tuningcylinder-109: Tuning Cylinder (To Dawn, from a Very Rainy Night)
game:dialogue-tobias-ask-tuningcylinder: Do you have any interesting tuning cylinders?
game:dialogue-tobias-tuningcylinder-resp: I suppose I do, yes. If you have an unattuned tuning cylinder, then I could create a copy for you. I only have two cylinders though: "Devastation" and "Tenacious". Would you like one of these?
game:dialogue-tobias-no-unattuned-cylind: I don't have an unattuned tuning cylinder
game:dialogue-tobias-no-unattuned: Well, my tuning cylinders aren't going anywhere. Come back anytime.
game:dialogue-tobias-tuningcylinder-give: Just a second. This one is not a very cheerful tone. However, I suppose this world usually isn't very cheerful either.
Just a second. You know, this cylinder is one of my favorites. I am glad I was able to find it again. Here you go.
game:dialogue-tobias-dont-want-tuningcyl: I don't want these right now.
Very well. Anything else I can help you with?
game:dialogue-sedna-ask-tuningcylinder: If you're a musician, do you have any tuning cylinders?
game:dialogue-sedna-tuningcylinder-respo: Of course! Unfortunately I cannot give them away. These are very hard to come by and I am not one to dig around old ruins myself. But if you had an unattuned tuning cylinder, I would gladly create a copy for you. I have recorded many songs on my own resonator. Including of course my own: "Substitute For An Epitaph". I truly cannot recommend it enough. Additionaly I could also offer the seasonal songs from this village. Or maybe you would prefer a song from further away? I could offer one from a village located in the cold and frigid north. Or how about a song from a village on top of a windy cliff? Which one would you like?
game:dialogue-sedna-no-unattuned-cylinde: I don't have an unattuned tuning cylinder
game:dialogue-sedna-no-unattuned: That is a shame. However, I am planning to stay here for a little while longer. Should you come into possesion of a an unattuned tuning cylinder during this time, bring it here.
game:dialogue-sedna-tuningcylinder-nadiy: From a village on a windy cliff
From a village in the north
game:dialogue-sedna-tuningcylinder-give-: A very good choice. You have excellent taste. Here you go, enjoy.
It was quite a beautiful village this one. A shame what happened to them.
It has been quite a while, since I last visited that village. It is quite a difficult journey to get there.
This song is a beautiful way to apreciate the return of spring: Warmer, longer days, the snow melting, flowers blooming. It is truly beautiful.
The Nadiyans play this song during their summer solstice festival. I have visited it once. It was quite a sight to behold.
When the temperatures start to drop and the final harvest comes in, is the perfect time for this song. A celebration of the beauty of fall and the year that is coming to an end.
A lovely tune to welcome the cold season. I enjoy playing it during winter.
game:dialogue-sedna-dont-want-tuningcyli: I don't want these right now.
Sure. You can come back any time, if you change your mind.
Hm. I would have thought you had better taste than that.
game:dialogue-resonator-tuningcylinder-r: (You find two songs that must have been performed in front of this resonator at some point. You could copy them onto an unattuned tuning cylinder, if you have one.)
game:dialogue-resonator-no-unattuned-cyl: (You do not have an unattuned tuning cylinder, right now)
